website_summaries.verdict: While it should be reserved strictly for a mature audience, Bayonetta 2 is a masterful action game brimming with vibrant visuals and a larger-than-life presence.
pros: Bayonetta 2 is an over-the-top surreal action game that is unlike anything you've ever seen
Its pace is staggering, challenging and features some of the most breathtaking enemies and boss fights ever seen in a game
cons: While it's a fantastic game, Bayonetta 2 is exclusively available for a console that's mostly targeted at a younger audience
It's also not as fun to play on the Wii U GamePad as it is on classic controllers

customer_reviews.title: With the core formula not changed from Bayonetta 1 (and that's not a bad thing), Bayonetta 2 still manages to go above ...
customer_reviews.text: A stellar sequel. With the core formula not changed from Bayonetta 1 (and that's not a bad thing), Bayonetta 2 still manages to go above and beyond. It's bigger and better and streamlines the campaign from the first installment. With the amount of unlockables and collectibles plus the addition of an online component, the replay-ability factor is huge.

product_meta.title: Bayonetta 2 - Nintendo Wii U
product_meta.description: Platform:Nintendo Wii U| Edition:StandardBayonetta's back and more powerful than ever. Wield wild new weapons and execute deadly new moves "like the powerful Umbran Climax "to take out angels and demons in this breathtaking action game. You can even team up with friends in 2-player online* co-op fights. Bayonetta is a butt-kicking, havoc-wreaking witch who wields sweet weapons like pistols, whips, hammers, flamethrowers, and poison bows. But it's not just about brawn "it's also about style. Bayonetta is deadly but sleek, with moves like Witch Time that slows down time itself, and the all-new Umbran Climax "a special magic attack that summons Infernal Demons to devastate enemies. Bayonetta 2 also features an all-new online 2-player cooperative mode where players bet halos on their performance and work together to amplify their sass, cause destruction, and score some riches.

Catch up on the Bayonetta universe with a pack-in deal
